column2: Amber is extracted here, and traded with Zharr-Naggrund for a tidy profit.
Animals are slaughtered here, and used to feed the Dawi Zharr armies.
The tannery works day and night, sewing clothes for the Dawi Zharr.
Valuable Gems mined here, and traded with Zharr-Naggrund for a tidy profit.
Gold is mined here, and traded with Zharr-Naggrund for a tidy profit.
The furnaces burn day and night, smelting weapons of war.
The herbs found here nurse the warriors back to health.
Obsidian is extracted here, and traded with Zharr-Naggrund for a tidy profit.
Slaves mold items out of clay here, to be sent for Zharr-Naggrund.
Salt is mined here, and used to preserve food for armies on the march.
Timber is used to fuel the furnaces of the Dawi Zharr.
